Source.Name: isync
Source.Summary: isync is a command line application which synchronizes mailboxes
Source.Description: isync is a command line application which synchronizes mailboxes; currently Maildir and IMAP4 mailboxes are supported. New messages, message deletions and flag changes can be propagated both ways. isync is suitable for use in IMAP-disconnected mode.

Package.Name: isync
Package.Summary: isync is a command line application which synchronizes mailboxes
Package.Description: isync is a command line application which synchronizes mailboxes; currently Maildir and IMAP4 mailboxes are supported. New messages, message deletions and flag changes can be propagated both ways. isync is suitable for use in IMAP-disconnected mode.
